chef_recipes.cooking_method: Boil the shrimp stock, then add the lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves. After that, add the shrimp, mushrooms, fish sauce, and lime juice. Finally, garnish with cilantro leaves and serve hot.

Soak the rice noodles in water for 30 minutes, then fry the garlic and shallots until golden brown. Add the chicken and stir-fry until cooked, then add the shrimp and cook until pink. After that, add the noodles, bean sprouts, tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar. Stir-fry until everything is mixed well, then add the eggs and stir-fry for another minute. Finally, garnish with peanuts, cilantro, and lime wedges and serve hot.

Mix the curry paste with coconut milk, then bring to a boil. Add the chicken and stir-fry until cooked, then add the eggplant and cook until tender. After that, add the bamboo shoots, green beans, fish sauce, and sugar. Stir-fry until everything is mixed well, then add the basil leaves and stir-fry for another minute. Finally, serve hot with rice.

chef_recipes.cooking_method: Boil spaghetti in salted water, fry pancetta and garlic, mix eggs, Parmesan cheese and pepper, add pasta and pancetta, stir well.
Preheat oven to 500°F, roll out pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella cheese, drizzle olive oil, bake for 10-12 minutes.
Boil lasagna sheets, make meat sauce with tomato sauce, beef, and spices, make béchamel sauce, layer pasta, meat sauce, and béchamel sauce, bake for 30-40 minutes.

chef_recipes.cooking_method: Boil spaghetti until al dente. In a separate pan, cook diced pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, mix eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and black pepper. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat and add the egg mixture. Toss until the eggs are cooked and the sauce is creamy.

Preheat the oven to 450°F. Roll out the pizza dough and spread tomato sauce over it. Add slices of fresh mozzarella cheese and sprinkle with fresh basil. Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.

Mix together egg yolks and sugar until pale and thick. Add mascarpone cheese and mix until smooth. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Fold egg whites into the mascarpone mixture. Layer ladyfingers and the mascarpone mixture in a baking dish. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Before serving, dust with cocoa powder.
